name: rescuer
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who helps someone out of a dangerous or unpleasant situation: Two of the rescuers died in a second earthquake. As dark fell, rescuers were still searching for missing climbers. See
rescue
More examplesFewer examplesRescuers have found a body at the site.The two women were not found by mountain rescuers until 4.40am on Sunday. Rescuers searched for other survivors of the fire.
